text: Trevor Michael Georges (born 1962) is a English actor. He is best known for portraying Ed Bailey in the long-running ITV soap opera Coronation Street, a role he has played since June 2019. He has also acted in other British television series such as Casualty, EastEnders, Doctors, Doctor Who and Holby City. He has twin teenage daughters and is married. ==Other websites== * Category:1962 births Category:Living people Category:English television actors Category:Soap opera actors
title: Trevor Michael Georges
